example.text: President Biden's open border policies have welcomed illegal immigrants, crime, and other illicit drugs into our nation. As fentanyl overdoses continue to skyrocket, it is imperative that we secure our southern border. #BidenBorderCrisis
I appreciate the [[user]] taking time to talk to me today about how we can work together to increase options for women’s healthcare and combat Medicare fraud. [[url]]

Even though Odee is still learning the rules and procedures, he has been instrumental in leading the Warriors in an undefeated season and an appearance in the state title game. To watch my floor speeches click HERE .

This week, the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Pandemic held its first hearing on the origins of the Coronavirus to answer these very questions. For two years, House Democrats have refused to conduct any meaningful investigation into the origins and are even making baseless claims that our investigation is rooted in white supremacy and hatred.

Since he was sworn in, President Biden has been unraveling border policies that were proven to work. It's no surprise the crisis at our southern border is out of control. Thankfully, House Republicans are committed to protecting our nation and securing our border. [[url]]

There is enough data available for people to make their own informed decisions on whether or not to wear a mask. Legislative Roundup This week I led a letter with Representative Feenstra (IA-04), Representative Hinson (IA-01), and Representative Axne (IA-03) to United States Trade Representative Ambassador Katherine Tai demanding action be taken to enforce the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement and protect corn farmers in Iowa.

Legislative Roundup This week I cosponsored Representative Christopher Smith's (NJ-4) HR 7570 Protect Servicemembers who Refuse the COVID Vaccine which would reinstate our men and women in uniform that were removed from the Armed Forces because of refusing the COVID-19 vaccine. Other News This week I was grateful for the opportunity to write holiday cards to veterans in Iowa wishing them a happy holiday season and thanking them for their service.
